resources.string: Enter the rental property\'s address below. The address is used to label each property, and to make it easier to log trips
Next, we would like some basic information about the property. If you input the Purchase price then we can calculate your property\'s Cash on Cash Invested % correctly.
If excluded, this property won\'t be included in the main dashboard\'s financial totals and charts

If your property has a mortgage terms enables Housters to automatically set the principal, interest, and escrow amounts when you log mortgage payment transactions. If your made extra principal payments, then logging them as mortgage principal payments, then logging them as mortgage principal transactions will update the amortization schedule
